comments: ithprime(n) = floor(2^(n^2)*alpha(2))-2^(2*n-1)*floor(2^((n-1)^2)*alpha(2)). For n = 6 we have ithprime(6) = floor(2^36*alpha(2))-2^11*floor(2^25*alpha(2)) = 82282829837-2048*40177163 = 13.
references: G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, Clarendon Press, Oxford, 1979, page 345.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 03 2001
